name: Corphish
description: CORPHISH were originally foreign POKéMON that were imported as pets. They eventually turned up in the wild. This POKéMON is very hardy and has greatly increased its population.

abilities.name: Hyper Cutter
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Attack cannot be lowered by other Pokémon.  This ability does not prevent any Attack losses other than stat modifiers, such as the Attack cut from a burn.  This Pokémon can still be passed negative Attack modifiers through heart swap or power swap.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.effect: Moves cannot score critical hits against this Pokémon.  This ability functions identically to battle armor.

abilities.name: Adaptability
abilities.effect: This Pokémon inflicts twice as much damage with moves whose types match its own, rather than the usual same-type attack bonus of 1.5×.
abilities.description: Powers up moves of the same type.
